body.section: Hierarchy Education is a kind of BehavioralHealthAssessmentDomain

section.title: Description
section.p: This class is used to record the answers related to the education situation of the patient (e.g. education level as well as enrollment status for those who should be enrolled in school).

stentry.p: This attribute is used to specify the highest education level achieved by the patient.
This coded attribute is used to specify whether patients are enrolled, not enrolled, or has completed their education.
